item.title: java.net.UnknownHostException with Alpine Linux
item.description: There is no Name Service Switch file in Alpine linux, and java need one for java.net.InetAddress.getLocalHost for example. echo 'hosts: files mdns4_minimal [NOTFOUND=return] dns mdns4' > /etc/nsswitch.
